    level="1"
    right="Feat 12"

>
[Metallic Envisionment](/Feats.aspx?ID=3871) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Dark Archive](/Sources.aspx?ID=129) pg. 205</row>

**Archetype** [Mind Smith](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=194)

**Prerequisites**
[Mind Smith Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=3862)

</column>

---

You always account for every weakness, allowing your mind to imagine just the right physical form to take advantage of your opponents. Choose between [cold iron](/Equipment.aspx?ID=375) or [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379); all your mind weapon Strikes are treated as the chosen type of metal.
name: Metallic Envisionment
